674200.name: The DOCS: Department of Creatures
674200.description:
Enter a world where thousands of creatures are taking over, and you are the only one able to stop them. Do you have what it takes to defeat a plethora of enemies that are constantly trying to eliminate you? Enter the world of The DOCS: Department of Creatures, where you and your friends need to face the ultimate evil and come up on top!

The DOCS: Department of Creatures is an immersive single player and online co-op third person shooter game where only the strongest people survived after the apocalypse. They designed a specialized department called THE DOCS and every member needs to eliminate all the creatures found on our planet and free Earth from the ultimate evil.

PLAY AS ANYONE YOU WANT


You can play the role of any survivor in The DOCS: Department of Creatures, be it a civilian, policeman, soldier or detective. Nothing is impossible and you can be anyone as you try to face monsters. At the end of the day, everyone has a common goal, and that’s to kill creatures and send them back to hell.

It’s very important for us to let you choose and customize the way you want to play. That’s why you can easily customize the characters you want to play as via skins.

SOLO OR COOPERATIVE GAMEPLAY


You can play alone or with a friend, and there are endless possibilities. Solo gameplay is fierce and a lot more challenging since you need to do everything yourself. In co-op you can easily rely on your friend and strategize in order to take down dozens of enemies at the same time.

FULLY CUSTOMIZABLE WEAPONS AND NUMEROUS ATTACHMENTS


The DOCS: Department of Creatures comes with a huge array of weapons and attachments. You can even use a multitude of weapon skins. This helps you fully customize the way you play and just immerse yourself into the experience. It’s exciting to see what enemies you need to face next, and you can always switch your arsenal so you can get the best experience and results no matter the situation.

3 GAME MODES TO PLAYTHROUGH


Within the 3 game modes, The DOCS: Department of Creatures is bringing you great, fun gameplay with lots of different ways to enjoy the experience. You can engage in a boss rush, campaign experience or a wave based attack where you need to survive for as much time as possible.

If you believe you have what it takes to beat the monstrous enemies, join The DOCS: Department of Creatures and start saving our planet!

FEATURES


  • Stunning graphics powered by Unreal Engine
  • Third person action combat with 3 immersive game modes
  • Play alone or with friends
  • Customize your character
  • Customizable weapons

DETECTIVE AND OFFICE


Early Access buyers will get a special detective character with 18 different skins and an office place to go missions from.
